ack.title: ACKNOWLEDGMENTS
ack.p: We thank Robert Webster for the pHW2000 plasmid. We are grateful to Jane Rayner for editing the manuscript.

The study was supported in part by the Research Grants Council of the Hong Kong SAR (7629/13M, 17103214, 17154516, and 17107019), the Health and Medical Research Fund (14131032), the Respiratory Virus Research Foundation, Larry Yung, Richard Yu, Carol Yu, and the Providence Foundation Limited in memory of the late Lui Hac Minh.

H.C., K.-Y.Y., P.W., and M.Z. designed the studies; P.W., M.Z., S.-Y.L., B.W.-Y.M., P.C., X.H., S.L., H.L., C.J.C., Y.C., Y.-C.W., H.H., and W.S. performed experiments; H.C., P.W., M.Z., K.-Y.Y., K.K.-W.T., Z.C., and N.X. analyzed the data; H.C. and P.W. wrote the paper.
We have declared that we have no conflict of interest.
